癓字的基本解释

癓
wēi
足疮。

癓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wéi］
［《廣韻》無非切，平微，微。］
足上疮。

癓字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癓； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页781第18
【廣韻】【集韻】?無非切，音肥。足上瘡。　又【集韻】通作微。【詩·小雅】旣微且尰。【朱傳】骭瘍爲微，腫足爲尰。尰字从尣作。

癓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
癓字的起名意思

暂无。

wēi
Foot sores.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wéi］
["Guangyun" is nothing more than cutting, flat and subtle. ]
Sores on the feet.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　癓; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 781 18
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? It's nothing more than cut, sound fat. Sores on the feet.　[Jiyun] Through to micro. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Small and gentle. [Zhu Chuan] The ulcer is micro, and the swollen foot is 尰. The word 尰 is made from 尣.
